com.mongodb.connection

类 SslSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.connection.SslSettings

  • @Immutable
public class SslSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Settings for connecting to MongoDB via SSL.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.0

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      A builder for creating SSLSettings.

    • 方法详细资料

      • builder

        public static SslSettings.Builder builder()
        Gets a Builder for creating a new SSLSettings instance.
        返回:
        a new Builder for SSLSettings.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns whether SSL is enabled.
        返回:
        true if SSL is enabled.

      • isInvalidHostNameAllowed

        public boolean isInvalidHostNameAllowed()
        Returns whether invalid host names should be allowed. Defaults to false. Take care before setting this to true, as it makes the application susceptible to man-in-the-middle attacks.
        返回:
        true if invalid host names are allowed.

      • getContext

        public javax.net.ssl.SSLContext getContext()
        Gets the SSLContext configured for use with SSL connections.
        返回:
        the SSLContext, which defaults to null if not configured. In that case SSLContext.getDefault() will be used if SSL is enabled.
        从以下版本开始:
        3.5
        另请参阅:
        SSLContext.getDefault()
